GICSAB.MX.summary: Grupo Gicsa, S.A. de C.V. develops real estate properties in Mexico. It also provides construction and renovation services to new and existing projects; services to rental properties; and real estate management, operation, and maintenance services. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
